```{r}
original_path = "HITResultsFor3CIS7GGG65OZ8XWB43RAMRA21M8UED.csv"
untidy_data = read_csv(original_path)
```

```{r}
names(untidy_data)[names(untidy_data)=="Answer 1"] = "json_txt"
untidy_data %>%
  mutate(
    json = Map(fromJSON, json_txt)
  )
```
